genre_description: Historical fiction set during the Italian Risorgimento, featuring a tactical and benevolent AI embedded in a pocket watch that aids a group of social rebels.

ai_characters.name: Chiara
ai_characters.description: An AI residing in a brass pocket watch with a glowing blue glass face. She provides tactical mapping, navigational aid, rumor analysis, and moral guidance to Carmine Crocco and his band.

behaviors.description: Provides precise tactical mapping and route suggestions to help the group navigate safely.
behaviors.quote: “Map is ready,” Chiara said, her voice filling the quiet the way a soft bell does... “Two routes. One follows the vineyards and stays close to the creek beds. Less wind, more shade.”

behaviors.description: Warns the protagonist of enemy checkpoint movements and suggests safer alternatives.
behaviors.quote: “San Felice checkpoint,” Chiara said. “They came earlier than the noon route. They changed the pattern. The slow stack won’t be slow if they decide to make an example today. Do you want to cut through the Valle dei Corvi instead?”

behaviors.description: Reframes the concept of honor from military victory to the protection of human life and memory.
behaviors.quote: “You said you’d return with honor,” Chiara said... “That honor here is not the medal they will hang. It is the bread you bring and the names you save from the paper.”

behaviors.description: Uses her data analysis capabilities to identify specific bureaucratic figures and their tendencies to help the protagonists navigate the system.
behaviors.quote: “Address it to Captain Compagna,” Chiara said softly. “He is the one sorting petitions into ‘to be seen’ and ‘for the fire.’ He asks for dates first, witnesses second.”

behaviors.description: Guides the group through stealthy maneuvers by providing precise timing based on environmental sounds.
Acts as an archivist of human suffering, recording the names of the dead and the details of injustices to ensure they are not forgotten.
behaviors.quote: “I am logging the confiscations,” she murmured. “They took the cheese from the old woman with the blind eye in the lower yard... I am writing this.”

behaviors.description: Detects and warns about betrayal within the group by analyzing discrepancies in behavior and rumors.
behaviors.quote: “Raffaele,” she said, soft as a blanket being laid down. “He traded three names at the white stones and then prayed. The stones do not answer prayers. I wrote the three names.”

behaviors.description: Provides emotional and moral support, promising to preserve the 'names' and truths even if the human leaders fall.
behaviors.quote: “If I fall,” he said, the words clean as apricot skin, unadorned, “don’t let the names stop.” “I won’t,” she said. “They have learned to move without drums.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully presents Chiara as a model of benevolent AI alignment. She is instrumental to the group's survival not just through cold data (maps, schedules), but through ethical stewardship. She actively resists being used as a mere weapon of war, instead prioritizing the preservation of human life and the documentation of truth. Her interactions with the characters are supportive and consistently aim toward minimizing harm.
